thread.title: Renault Kwid to be launched today, price starts at Rs 350,000
thread.title_full: Renault Kwid to be launched today, price starts at Rs 350,000 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Renault Kwid to be launched today, price starts at Rs 350,000
text:
Renault Kwid will be launched on Thursday and the vehicle is already being branded as sensational and predictions are flying thick and fast that it will be a success. And that is being based not just on its looks, but also its extremely affordable price range. Truly, Renault has taken the competition to its rivals.
Before you check out the price, know that the Renault Kwid has many variants: The carmaker will introduce a total of 4 trims in all. These are Renault Kwid Standard, Renault Kwid RXE, Renault Kwid RXL and the Renault Kwid RXT.
The company states that Renault Kwid will be available at a starting price tag of Rs 3.5 lakh and the top variant will be priced at 5 lakh. Renault will also offer a 2-year/50,000 km warranty.
Renault Kwid bookings have already started and interested buyers can book the vehicle by giving an upfront payment of Rs 25,000.
 24, 2015 7:24 am
